About Me

Hi, my name’s Yves and I’m a full-stack web developer with experience in the finance industry and some formal education in Computer Science. I have previously built small apps in Java and Objective-C for iOS as a side hobby while in the banking industry and did a summer internship as a Flash developer in Hong Kong. I’m passionate about continuing to learn and develop my skillset as a developer in order to build out bigger and better applications.

Skills:

  • Languages: JavaScript Ruby HTML CSS Java Objective-C JSX EJS
  • Frameworks/Libraries: NodeJS ReactJS Ruby on Rails Express Knex Ajax jQuery SASS Bootstrap PG
  • Protocols: HTTP HTTPS WebSockets
  • Systems/Databases: SQL MongoDB Git
  • Spoken languages: English Cantonese (basic)

Projects

Chatty-App - Mar 2019

github.com/yvesdesjardins/chattyapp

This was a single page app built in ReactJS to emulate a Slack style chat program. I have implemented the use of hooks into this project in order to get more exposure to this new addition. I also utilized WebSockets for communication between the back-end server and any clients who have connected. JSX was also heavily utilized to correctly build the elements and have them display correctly to clients.

Do It - Mar 2019

github.com/rachelgould/smart-todo

This midterm project was worked on by myself and two other students with the intent being to build a single page “smart” todo list. I was responsible for building out the back-end of the project along with the database. Through this experience I have further developed my knowledge of proper Git usage in groups, SQL and Knex for database work and routing with Express.

Tweeter - Feb 2019

github.com/yvesdesjardins/tweeter

This is a project to emulate a Twitter style site as a single-page web app. I utilized SASS jQuery and Javascript for the front-end and MongoDB along with Express for the back-end.

Tiny-App - Feb 2019

github.com/yvesdesjardins/tinyapp

A single page web app built to emulate webpage shorteners like Bit.ly. I built this project using Javascript and EJS for the front-end, NodeJS and Express for the back-end.

During my short contract period with CIBC I assisted their team of junior sales staff with training and basic team building exercises.

Feb 2017 - Jul 2018

While at Sphere I was tasked with building out their business partnerships and assisting them with increasing net revenue. I also aided in the training of other junior members of the sales team, built a price scraper and a simple iOS app to aid in testing of devices internally.

Senior Financial Advisor

Nov 2014 - Feb 2017

At Scotiabank I worked my way from a junior sales officer to a senior role over the 3 years I was with them. During that time I learned how to assist clients, work with a team across departments and deal with tight time constraints.

Quam Securities Company Ltd.

Software developer intern

Jun 2009 - Jul 2009

At Quam, I built out a media player for use on their website using Flash Action Script. Along with this, I helped in maintaining the webpage and error checking other Flash-based resources.
